item.title: Roundcube with FrankenPHP on Debian
item.description: FrankenPHP is a “modern application server for PHP built on top of the Caddy web server”, which in its simplest form lets you serve PHP apps without the nginx/apache config salad you may be used to. Here’s how to set it up as a service on Debian.
